00029 /***************************************************************************//**
00030  * Implementation of CRC.
00031  *
00032  * Function for calculating CRC16 checksum based on the polynomial:
00033  * x^16 + x^15 + x^2 + 1 (0xa001). The code is based on sample code in avr-libc
00034  * documentation.
00035  *
00036  * An internal CRC value is used. This be reset, updated, and read back.
00037  *
00038  * @file crc16.c
00039  * @date 24-Jan-2010
00040  * @author Se√°n Harte
00041  ******************************************************************************/
00042 
00043 #include <stdint.h>
00044 
00045 #if defined UC_AVR || defined UC_8051
00046 #   include "global.h"      /* This file is also used by USB programmer */
00047 #endif
00048 #include "crc16.h"
00049 
00050 #ifdef UC_AVR
00051 #   include <util/crc16.h>
00052 #endif
00053 
00054 
00055 #define CRC_POLY        0xA001
00056 #define CRC_INIT_VALUE  0xFFFF
00057 
00058 
00059 /** Current CRC value. **/
00060 static uint16_t crcValue;
00061 
00062 
00063 /******************************************************************************\
00064  * See crc.h for documentation of these functions.
00065 \******************************************************************************/
00066 
00067 
00068 void crc16_init(void)
00069 {
00070     crcValue = CRC_INIT_VALUE;
00071 }
00072 
00073 
00074 uint16_t crc16_read(void)
00075 {
00076     return crcValue;
00077 }
00078 
00079 
00080 void crc16_update(uint8_t data)
00081 {
00082     uint8_t i;
00083 #ifdef UC_AVR
00084     crcValue = _crc16_update(crcValue, data);   /* Assembly implementation */
00085 #else
00086     crcValue ^= data;
00087     for (i = 0; i < 8; ++i) {
00088         if (crcValue & 1) crcValue = (crcValue >> 1) ^ CRC_POLY;
00089         else crcValue = (crcValue >> 1);
00090     }
00091 #endif
00092 }
